title: [Area 52 (1-3 players) Feat Cubicincubic][52区。。。。]
author: w873130585
txt_content:
本帖最后由 w873130585 于 2013-8-3 22:19 编辑 
                 該作品是根據知識共享署名 - 非商業性使用 - 禁止演繹3.0聲明頁面許可證。This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License.http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/cn/

此乃"艹孤剩他不喜欢这名字..那就 菰剩 好了" 让我转载的地图。。









5 am: area 52 is having a blackout
You disguise as navy seals to get the classified documents back before they fall in the wrong hands.
Your mission:
- find 8 classified documents- find the classified document "X"- find 3 survivors- return to the extraction point with all documents
Rules:
- 1-3 players (one kit per person)- don't pick blocks- don't sleep- don't play in peacefull- play with Sphax pure bdcraft Texture pack- play with optifine with connected textures (recommended)







手翻:(还好英文少。多了就直接机翻。。。英文渣勿喷。)



凌晨5点,第52区停电 你伪装成海报突击部队前去获取机密文件,要防止它落入坏人的手中  你的任务: -找到8份机密文件-找到标有"X"的机密文件-找到三个幸存者-获取所有文件后返回 规则:1-3个玩家不要破坏方块不要睡觉(.....真心没翻译错吧。。不要睡觉???)不要在和平模式下玩安装推荐的材质包。。(意思就这个。)




视频欣赏:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNTkxMjQ2ODE2/v.swf

反差真心大。
